definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Pseudomonas solanacarum (Smith) Smith.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一种由青枯假单胞菌引起的生姜毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: Fresh ginger is used in Asian and oriental cookery.
sentences.chinese: 非洲人和东方人用新鲜的生姜来烹饪。

sentences.english: In the Indonesia it is served warm with palm sugar syrup that has been flavored with pandanus leaves and ginger.
sentences.chinese: 印尼的豆花会加棕榈树糖浆，用露兜树叶和生姜调味。

sentences.english: Ginger still has the effect with be good at stomachic stomach.
sentences.chinese: 生姜还有健胃增进食欲的作用。

sentences.english: A great treatment for a cold is fresh ginger tea.
sentences.chinese: 对于感冒的最好疗法是生姜茶。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Ralstonia solanacearum.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一种由青枯劳尔氏菌引起的生姜毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: Chelseas Ginger is hanging in her room in Chappaqua today.
sentences.chinese: 《切尔西的生姜》现在仍然挂在她在查帕奎的房间里。

sentences.english: Common cold has abdominal pain, ginger play do porridge.
sentences.chinese: 伤风感冒又腹痛，生姜上场来做粥。

sentences.english: Turmeric is mildly aromatic and has scents of orange or ginger.
sentences.chinese: 姜黄粉气味芬芳，发出一种橙子和生姜的气味。

sentences.english: The root-ginger should be crushed up before it is added to the boiling jam.
sentences.chinese: 生姜应该压碎后再加到煮沸的果酱中去。

sentences.english: Vanilla with a hint of ginger, dried fruits, sherry sweetness and wood □□oke.
sentences.chinese: 香草与暗示生姜，干果，雪利酒甜度和木材烟雾。

sentences.english: Of policy measures is eat crab after a drink ginger hot red-sugar water.
sentences.chinese: 应对之策就是进食蟹肉后喝一杯生姜红糖水。

sentences.english: In recent years, animal experiments have shown that Zingiber officinale Roscoe. (ginger) has a stronger role in the lipid regulation.
sentences.chinese: 近些年的动物实验表明生姜具有较强的血脂调节作用。

sentences.english: I had some ginger powder in the house, so I tried it with the larvae.
sentences.chinese: 我家里有些生姜粉，所以我就拿来试探这些幼虫。

sentences.english: Don't put pickled ginger on your sushi.
sentences.chinese: 不要把泡菜生姜和寿司一起吃。

sentences.english: Store ginger root at room temperature with foil covering any cut or exposed pieces of the ginger.
sentences.chinese: 储存在室温温度姜根带箔覆盖任何削减或生姜片曝光。

definition: orange peel/tangerine peel/dried orange peel used in Chinese medicine
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
